name: Downhill (shikopaleta)
description:
Small game made in 1 week as part of a learning experiment. This is the result of the first 1-week-challenge hosted by Shikopaleta.

Controls:

  • [Space Bar] - Jump; hold to jump higher.
  • [Left Mouse button] - Melee attack
  • [Right Mouse button] - Fireball attack.
  • [Alt + F4] - Close the game.

Objective:

  • Survive for as long as you can to boost your score. The longer the game goes, the higher the multiplier for your score!

Music by Beethoven himself.

 Team members:

  • Shikopaleta
  • NijoMeisteR
